en_question: 2.42 A certain cultural and educational supplies factory uses raw material white base paper to produce three types of products: manuscript paper, diaries, and exercise books. The factory currently has 100 workers, and the monthly supply of white base paper is 30,000 kg. It is known that a worker’s labor productivity is: each person per month can produce 30 bundles of manuscript paper, or 30 dozens of diaries, or 30 boxes of exercise books. It is known that the raw material consumption is: each bundle of manuscript paper uses $3~{\frac{1}{3}}~\mathrm{kg}$ of white base paper, each dozen of diaries uses $13~{\frac{1}{3}}~\mathbf{kg}$ of white base paper, each box of exercise books uses $26~{\frac{2}{3}}~\mathbf{kg}$  of white base paper. It is also known that the profit for producing: one bundle of manuscript paper is 2 yuan, one dozen of diaries is 3 yuan,one box of exercise books is 1 yuan. Question: If the supply of white base paper remains unchanged, and when the number of workers is insufficient, temporary workers can be hired at a wage cost of 40 yuan per person per month, then:Should the factory hire temporary workers? And if so, how many is optimal?
cn_question:
2.42某文教用品厂用原材料白坏纸生产原稿纸、日记本和练习本三种产品。该厂现有工人100人,每月白坯纸供应量为 $30000~kg$ 。已知工.人的劳动生产率为：每人每月可生产原稿纸30捆,或生产日记本30打·或练习本30箱。已知原材料消耗为：每捆原稿纸用白坯纸 $3~{\frac{1}{3}}~\mathrm{kg}$ ,每打日记本用白坯纸 $13~{\frac{1}{3}}~\mathbf{kg}$ ,每箱练习本用白坯纸 $26~{\frac{2}{3}}~\mathbf{kg}$ 。又知每生产一捆原稿纸可获利2元，生产一打日记本获利3元，生产一箱练习本获利1元。试确定：  
如白坯纸的供应数量不变，当工人数量不足时可招收临时工，临时工工资支出为每人每月40元，则该厂要不要招收临时工，招多少临时工最合适?
